title: Online Instructional Design for Elementary Mathematics Using Active Learning Strategies and Technologies

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics foundational concepts and online learning tool usage experience
context.additional_context: Targeting 30-something working professionals (elementary teachers) to strengthen mathematics lesson design competencies, conducted in an environment where digital devices (tablets/laptops) are provided. Focuses on applying active learning techniques in non-face-to-face settings.

learning_goals: Design and operate discussion-based mathematical problem-solving activities in online environments.
Develop and implement a role-play-based math concept inquiry lesson model for formative assessment.
Create digital learning materials (e.g., Padlet, Jamboard) applying collaborative problem-solving techniques.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
